language.entry: Gourmet

Self: {colour_start|healhp}Heal{colour_end} 4 HP for each target and corpse
Yokai
Yokai

Much like the rest of its porcine kin, the Gourmet harbors a brutal ferocity with a combination of debilitating strikes and devastating blows. The culinary skills it has developed can be witnessed in combat, peppering foes with attacks in preparation for a final savory onslaught of violence. Ensuring the customer is satisfied is critical for any chef, and the Gourmet is proficient at supporting allies so they may partake in the feast as well.

Wielding massive cooking implements, the Gourmet is always ready to prepare a new meal from the remains of anything unfortunate enough to be considered fresh ingredients. While an apron does not provide much defense from attack, the swine's massive bulk ensures it will outlast any and all dining confrontation.

The swine's frightening visage may be oppressive and its methods unnerving at best, but there is no denying the exquisite results of its gastronomical skills. With only a makeshift kitchen, the Gourmet can prepare a hearty feast that can bolster the endurance of all willing to partake. Just don't ask what is in it...

Cleaver & Mallet

Apron

Mystery Meal
Cacaphonous Dinner Bell
"Want food. GOOD food. Want MORE. Make. MORE!!!"
Vengeful EntrÃ©e
Spoiled Delicacy
Moon Shadow Truffles
Infernal Wasabi
Napoleon's Head
Monster Lasagna
Everything Burger
Grilled Cursed Marrow
Living Bone Soup
Pelagic Sashimi
Abyssal Platter
Wretch Ribs and Potatoes
Swine Folk Trotters
Shrieker and Mushroom Skewer
The Hag's Special
Bloodsucker Haggis
Bloody Sangria
Non-Euclidian Pastry
Paradox Omelette
Stuffed Heinke Crab
Treasured Tofu
Say pal, you don't look so good.
A hearty meal with a bit of everything! The sheer amount will leave one sluggish after consuming.
Have a taste of the wicked power over life your foes wield, however brittle it may leave you feeling.
A simple meal lacking robust ingredients, but the quality of what has been utilized fills one with a hardy sensation.
The sharp and savory flavor inspires enjoyers into doubling their efforts to procure more!
The bewitching tastes of the deep give adventurers an appreciation for the quiet and safety it provides.
An enriching meal from the finest cut of swine. It will leave you craving more!
For those with an adventurous palate, the swine's appendages make for an exhilarating treat.
(gagging) Oh yeah... that was good...
Fine. Just don't tell me what's in it.
Oh hells that... was not so bad actually.
Well it does look better than I expected.
Urp!... thanks...
Wait, YOU made this? It's surprisingly good.
Mmmm.. what's this crunchy pa- Wait. No. Don't answer that...
At this point, I will eat just about anything.
Mmmmm... perfect.
<chomp!> <scarf!> <slurp!>
This... what you call "art."
Me give five star!
You no want? Hmmph. More for me.
<BELCH>
You smell... (SNIFF) ...good.
Taste this. It good. No has human meat... This time.
Here. Sweet snack. Stop whine.
Little taste... No? Hmph.
Rub dirt in. It good.
Save bandage. Will use in stew. Add flavor.
Hunt. Cook. Eat. Sleep. Repeat. Is good.
Full. Not eat you.
We live. They die. We eat. All good.
BRUTISH NATURE
(low growl)
(a warning grunt)
BOUNTIFUL FEAST
Hmph. You can have... some.
Much food. Eat fill. Need be strong!
HAVE A TASTE
You. Taste this. What think?
You like? (grunt) Yes. You do.
Hrrmmm... Need salt?
LEFTOVERS
Hrmph. Was saving this...
(sniff) Good. Mold is ripe.
Taste... blood... mmmm...
NO. NOT EATEN. ME EAT!
Second course...
Room for dessert.
If you die, me make you in good meal. No worry.
(eyes shine with a cold glint)
...Hmph.
Good. Now fight!
Food get cold. Eat now!
Me get hungry...
(snort) grrrr...
NO PUSH.
(growls) WAIT IN LINE.
Hmph. Too many cooks in kitchen.
NO SWINE. HATE.
Only me! NO MORE!
(slurp)
Hrrmmm... Need salt.
Unleash flavor!
Sooie! SOOOOO-IEEEE!!!
Hmmph. Not worth garnish.
RrrreeeaaAAAAA!!!
Carve off slice!
Kill! Cook! EAT!!!
Meal soon ready...
Mmmm... Taste good.
You need limb? Hmmph. Fine.
(sniffs) Smell... blood...
Grrr... Hungry.
Food hurt! Bad food!
Need... food...
So... hungry...
(growls and whines)
Want cook... not...
(squeals)
Feel... wrong.
(shuffling backwards awkwardly)
(sniffs air in anticipation)
Hmm? Smell... hmmmm...
Hmmph.
Move. Smell food.
We go.
Too spicy! No good!
Mmmm... smell good... GUH?! THAT ME?!
Bleh... rotten.
(licks at bleeding wound)
No! Is my blood! Stop blood!
Hmm? This my blood? Or food stain?
No bleed in food! Will ruin!
(flinches from the light source) grrrr...
Bleh. Light taste bad for eyes.
Me no like bright. Food no like bright too.
No need see. Me smell them.
No light. Smell that? Food near.
No fear. Dark good. Smell good.
Good. No light. Lure out big food.
(sniffs) Mmmmm... food coming.
Dark... good.
(smells each item curiously)
This make food more good.
This food? Hmmm...
Grrrrrr...
(frustrated huffs)
Hmmph.
Bland.
Move.
Please, let this item save me from harm!
This good? This bad? This trap?!
Hmmm... No sharp enough...
Grrrr... MOVE, RUNT. Me do it!
MINE.
(huffs)
Me eat this! And that! And this!
All nooks. All crannies. Need check.
(snuffling curiously)
What this? Me find out.
(low chanting grunts)
Tummy feel... sad.
(excited snuffling)
This... give me idea...
Me is chef! More great than swine! Most great ever!
Need clean tools. Need more shine.
(nods) Good killing tool. Make good food from meat.
Me is chef! More great than swine! Most great ever!
Me claw self from filth! Me be good chef!
ME. HUNGER.
Shiny? Shiny!
Me see! Me see!
(sniffs) This smell... is good smell... Me taste all of it!
Hmmph. Spirits not happy. Me fix.
Hmmm? Voice? Where voice?
(low chanting grunts)
ME EAT. AND EAT. AND EAT. STILL HUNGER. EAT UNTIL GONE!
Me find! Me keep!
I did not think we'd have it this bad...
This is more daunting than I'd expected...
This is not so difficult after all.
This will be the easiest pay I've ever received.
Another battle may be the end of us.
We have paid for our folly in blood...
We are healthy and prepared for what may come.
At this rate, we should be home by dawn.
My wounds are many and I feel weak.
Just leave me here. I only slow you down.
I am ready for battle. Let them come.
I am blessed with good health. For today, at least.
I've seen nothing I am not prepared for.
It looks bad, but there is nothing to fear here.
I am not myself... Please, forgive me.
You must forgive me... this place -- it is getting to me.
We are healthy and mentally steeled for this challenge!
We are the flame!
We must return to town... Please, listen to me!
Hopeless. The mission is utterly hopeless.
We are out of firewood. We must steel ourselves for a push to the end.
We've used our last log. So that's the state of things.
Our provisions run low. This journey best not last much longer.
Perhaps we could forage some berries? ... No?
Well, at least we won't go hungry.
Whoever packed all this food, I could kiss you.
Perhaps a bonfire would frighten away the monsters.
Save the wood for when we need it. Danger ahead.
I am glad to face these dangers with all of you.
We must be on our guard. I'll take first watch.
Sleep calls. We'll need our strength.
Drink good. Use in food!
ME. WANT. MORE!
Bleh. Taste bland. Move. Me make instead.
(marches directly into the kitchen and starts preparing meals)
"Eating contest"? ...Heh.
(is challenged by the tavern's chef to yet another cooking contest)
Me know game. But for swine, loser die. Is fun.
...Why you look me that way?
Grrr... no touch. You eat this. Tell what think.
...What mean "kom-patt-a-bull?"
Hmmm... you smell good.
Hmmm... what make this food more good?
Snack. Nap. Good.
...This boring. Me go cook.
What "Light"? It taste good?
This work? If say so...
Will build hunger!
Blood will make good sauce!
Bath? Me is clean! Stains for taste!
Me no like doctor...
Bleh. "Medicine" taste bad.
What you mean me "unhealthy"?!
Move. Me want drink.
No. Drink taste more good.
No sleep. Drink first.
That dumb. Drink good.
Hmmm. Drink make blood taste good? Find out. Need more drink.
Me want challenge.
Boring. Me know more good game.
No. Is boring. Want fun.
Me seek win! Beat loser!
Me strong enough. Will show and win!
Want bring food to nice person.
Where smell good friend? No want losers.
Boring. Me find friend.
This dumb. Where person with good smell? Me smell them.
No pain. Friend is soft.
Want drink alone.
Grrrr... Hate lose. Want quiet.
No want touchy soft person. Want cook alone.
They no let me sleep there.
No. Me want sleep.
Church person say this bad.
Friend in church no like this game.
Me want church friend. Not soft person.
Where church friend? Me smell them.
Church person more nice.
Me drink blood! It more good!
Me challenge body! No want losers!
Soft person no make strong. PAIN MAKE STRONG.
Too quiet. Bring pain!
Light weak! Me strong! Pain make more strong!
Bleh. Drink make food bad.
Better drink in warrens...
Hmmph. Losers no trust me.
Me no cheat! Is rule for swine!
Soft person no like me...
Me confuse. Me was told to taste. Why wrong?
Boring.
Me have food idea. Must make now!
Even swine no do what me see there...
Hmmph. And they call me "monster."
Light dumb. Too bright.
Me no like Light. It confuse. No can eat.
Why pain self? It dumb.
What? It want me hurt? Grrrr...
Where kitchen? Show me.
Hmmph. Too bright.
Yes. Me am swine. Now move. Want make food.
... (grunts)
No worry. Me no eat people. Too scrawny.
Me make food. You thank. Is good.
Need more ingredients. Me go get.
Is time to hunt. Then cook. Then eat.
(grunts)
Me pack lunch. We go now.
Hrrmmm... hungry.
Want snack. Or else...
(sniffing air) Smell... hmmmmm...
ME SMELL FEAR!
(guttural growling and snarling)
Kitchen closed! IS ALL MINE!
Hmm? Missing person? Me know? ......no.
(frantic squealing)
NO NO NO NO NO NO NO!!!
(found shivering silently in corner of tavern)
NO! YOU STAY AWAY!
NO TOUCH FOOD! YOU RUIN!
Me see you look! Want me food! You no get!
... (heavy sigh)
Taste... bland...
Hmm? Lunch? Huff... fine.
This food MINE! NOT FOR YOU!
Me big! You small! Me get MORE!
This food is MINE! NOT FOR YOU!
(ferocious growl)
You runt. All you runts. Hate runts.
You weak. Scrawny. No worth meal.
Mmmmmm... me blood taste good.
Swine taste good. Me swine... hmmmm...
Me hunger for pain!
(imitating various animal sounds)
Me know now! Me no pig! Me pretty pony!
<belch> Ha ha-snrk ha haaa! <BELCH>
(chugging a casket of wine)
Bring more! Wash down meal!
<BELCH> Mmmm... good.
Umm... these cards good?
This game dumb. We test strength!
What? Chips no food? Oh...
Me confuse... what you want?
Mmmmm... you taste... good.
That no how eat food! You n- oh.
Hmmmmmmm...
<snore>
...Bored.
Ummm... Me no get this...
...No answer. Me do this right?
Where "Light"? Me no smell it.
(pained squealing)
(roars of pain)
Pain add flavor!
Me see... ink spot.
Doctor dumb! Me strong! Me no listen!
(annoyed growling)
No bath! NO BATH!!!
Doctor food bad. Me no eat!
Bleh! Me hate bad drink!
That place... taste WRONG.
That place... hunger...
... Me... not hungry...
(sudden squealing before going eerily quiet)
The Flesh... All is Flesh...
That smell! That place! IT BURNS!!!
Warrens no safe... Hamlet no safe... Nowhere safe.
Cook for fish lady! You be meal!
NO MORE SWINE. NOW FISH.
NO EAT FISH. FISH EAT YOU!
(licks maw) Seafood...
(sniff) Smell fishy...
Taste rotten.
(grunt) No good meat.
This... hunger... (whine)
No! Me no food! Me eat food!
Taste bad! Taste pain!
Me no season! Need pepare!
Salt... Too much salt...
Me no want seafood...
No swim! Belly full!
Me no join! No like swim!
Me no join! No like swim!
Me no join! No like swim!
Me no join! No like swim!
Me no join! No like swim!
Weak king! You protect runt? Bah!
Me kill king! Me kill runt! Make meal from both!
You next, RUNT.
You make good appetizer before king, runt.
Me hate runt! Feed to rats!
KILL RUNT! KILL IT!
Hmmm? What noise?
What metal thing do?...
Fire go boom!
Hmmm? What noise?
Hmmm? That rain?
Me no like look of eyes man...
Last meal...
This is it... They won!
I failed them all...
Where is my flame? I see only darkness...
My flame will be snuffed out!
Look how their eyes are flame!
Evil lurks here and it hungers..
This is it isn't it?
We'll all be snuffed out...
The fire in my heart flickers?
Do I feel the cold creep upon me? Where's the warmth?
A t-tactical retreat!
I n-need to relight the torch!
I slink back to the darkness...
I need t-time to prepare these explosives!
Come on dammit! Light already!
What are you, insane?!
They already figured us out!
They know our tactics!
There's no time for such foolishness!
I refuse!
Aw blast... you pitiless bastard!
I fumbled the lighter!
My iron fails me!
Too much smoke in my eyes!
B-but you had a clear shot?!
We've got no chance... We should run!
Can't you see they're toying with us!?
But will the next hit land too?!
There's no where else to run!
That wasn't part of the plan!
Stop moving or you will explode!
Stay put! These explosives are unstable!
Not even the power of fire can help us now.
We are not the Flame, we are but moths!
Who is to say we'll survive any of this?
I keep telling you there's NO TIME!
AHHH! Do not startle me while handling such explosives!
Unhand me!
This is a trap! I know it!
Enemies at every corner!
Silence! I can hear their dark whispers...
I refuse to get burned again!
Why do you turn your eye away? Hiding something?
I see that flicker in your eye!
Something's not right. I can feel it...
This was the plan, eh? To turn on me!?
I can always smell a rat...
The truth will always come to light, you traitors!
I know that one... It's back for revenge!
More are coming! I know it!
Like I would trust you to watch my back!
No - they'll expect that!
No. They'll see that coming.
And play right into their hands? Foolish.
I prefer to keep them guessing.
These ones are sly - I must improvise!
I must be unpredictable, like wildfire!
I'll burn down this estate and everything in it! Including you!
Betrayer!
WHAT?! Trying to leave me here to die? I DON'T THINK SO!
YOU IDIOTS THAT'S THE WRONG WAY!
AHH! AHH! My clothes are on fire! Put it out! Put it out!
Someone must've told them where we'd be!
Did you blow smoke into my eyes?!
You LET it come at me! TRAITOR!
I told you! They know our weaknesses!
Something's afoot!
No. Stay there where I can see you!
No, I'm keeping my eye on you!
I know sabotage when I see it!
I can take care of myself!
Ha! You've always thought I was weak, didn't you?!
You thought you could get one over me, eh?
Ha! You've always thought I was weak, didn't you?!
Unhand me!
You backstabbing son of a...
I knew it... You're with them!
The only thing I trust here is the damn campfire!
I'm not the one shouting, maybe YOU SHOULD STOP SHOUTING!
Actually, I think this is the perfect time to start pointing fingers...
I only help those that I trust!
Where is my iron?! WHERRRE IS IT?!
Forget it. I'm better off alone...
You're only doing this to help them aren't you?
Keep your sorcery to yourself.
You're only doing this to help them aren't you?
Why did you burn the food?!
Why did you spill yer beans?
A wildfire cares not who it burns.
It's a wildfire duty to burn away the diseased and weak!
Stand in my way and I'll burn you too!
If you can't stand the heat, then get out of my way!
Burn to ash, mongrels!
That was pitiful!
Are you trying to get yourself killed?!
I wouldn't piss on you even if you were on fire.
Maybe I should light a fire under you to wake you up!
My expectations are...underwhelmed.
Watch a pro at work!
I don't take orders from amateurs!
Get out of my way!
All it takes is a spark!
Expect nothing and you'll get nothing!
Taste some iron!
Will this spark any competense in you?!
Hmph. A child could do better.
You could have killed it, had you any skill.
Don't look for sympathy. You won't find it.
You pathetic twit!
Pathetic. (spits)
Hah! You really are pathetic.
Shove me again and I'll put you down.
Stay put. Or I'll knock you sideways.
You're whimpering is starting to annoy me...
It seems the campfire is the only competent one here.
You're incompatance is going to kill us all!
I'm surrounded by morons...
You've got some nerve bothering me at a time like this!
(groans) You again?!
(spits) SOD OFF!
I don't need help from some amateur!
Wow, you have no idea what you are doing do you?
In the end...everything burns!
Oh, how it is a PLEASURE to burn!
The Fire has been set ABLAZE!
Only I can see Fire for the beauty that She is!
These burns remind me that I am alive!
Dearest Fire, embrace me in your warmth!
The Fire burns only those She deems unworthy!
BOIL...BLISTER...BURN!!
We must feed the Fire, we must help Her grow!
Like fire...Hellfire! This fire in my skin!
I must feel Her warmth!
I cannot feel the Fire's heat!
I am but a moth to a flame!
Hit me! Come on, ye bastard, HIT ME!
Let's make this interesting!
Why worship the Light when there's Fire!
I must be as unpredictable as a forest fire!
The Fire burns me with glorious purpose!
If you aren't going to try your best then don't try at all!
Come now...light my FIRE!
You're worst wasn't enough and neither is your best!
I won't leave until everything in this room is ashes!
Not before this entire room is engulfed in flames!
BURN THEM ALL! BURN THEM ALL!!!
I'll set my own body ablaze to keep the vengeance in my heart burning!
IMPOSSIBLE!
I must have smoke in my eyes!
The best way to stop the bleeding is to cauderize it!
Let me seal the wound with my hot iron!
Does a roaring fire move when it is told?
Ineptitude is the true killer.
I don't need this! Where's my bottle of petrol?
No! Bring me my box of flint!
No! Let the Fire burn my weaknesses away.
No! I will cauderize the wound myself when we're done.
No! Let the Fire burn my weaknesses away.
This campfire needs more space to breathe, yes?
I need to get a...closer look at this campfire.
The Fire is...mesmerizing, isn't She?
I'm too busy watching the flames flicker to bother with you.
Eh?! Don't make me punch you...
You don't interest me.
Can't you see I'm busy applying my burn ointment?
Don't touch me.
Startle me like that again, and I'll punch you.
It's raw. Put mine back on the flame.
Make mine, "well done". Heh.
I have sacrificed much...and I deserve so much more!
A wild fire takes all, and so will I!
You have no idea what I have gone through to finally see justice!
If I cannot have my vengence, I'll settle for gold.
Bah! More ashes...more dissapointments!
I was foolish to put my trust in all of you...
You and I are not equals. Remember this.
In time, the strong will burn away the weak.
I'll keep the gold, I'll use it better than you could.
It seems I'm the only one who has a plan, *again.*
That's my kill!
That one's mine.
Grrr! You're blocking me!
Out of the way, you imp!
Someone has to take the reins!
Oh so you think you can do better? Go on ahead.
Why am I doing this again?
I've taken enough hits, how about you take a turn?
At least you can be a competent shield.
You should take the next hit
I think I know how to deal with this one...
Like Hell I will!
You think I'm going to take orders from YOU of all people?
Hah. I think not.
What mkes you think I'll cooperate?
Watch a master at work!
Sod off. You don't command me.
NO! I'm the one that's in charge here!
Know your place. I know mine!
I know what I'm doing!
One more like that and you're on your own!
As if I should be frightened?
Get out of my way! You're fouling up my aim!
Trying to steal my thunder, eh?
Good. I wanted to kill that one myself!
More for me then...
This was a failure...for one of us.
...And why should I help you?
What I need to do is rest, and what I need comes first.
(mumbling) If I could, I'd burn this entire place to the ground...
If I die today, I blame my insipid comrades...
It's simple really. (coughs) I'm just better than you.
This vendetta.. it is to much...
I've betrayed everything that I believed...
Revenge turns to ash in my mouth...
It's all just cold embers now...
Is this really my final stand?
I've been burning the candle at both ends for too long...
What am I to do when the flames die down?
The light dims...
This mission is impossible.
My life holds nothing but ashes...
Best get it over with.
I've already lost everything...
I'm just another fool for the fire.
That's just the way it is...
I slink back to the shadows...
I am finished...
I can't catch my breath...
She burned alive...
There's no redemption for me, is there?
I'd just screw it up...
There's nothing I can do now...
I didn't prepare for this...
Nothing could've prepared me for this.
I'll just do what I can.
What does it matter? We've lost.
(growl) I told you... It is pointless.
What's the point anymore?
Just darker days ahead... no hope left.
Lets just end this...
The end can't come soon enough...
Pain and fire, my faithful friends...
Let this be my funeral pyre.
At least grant this Viking Funeral.
It's useless! Leave me be!
Useless...it's all useless.
Please... I'm so exhausted...
These burns hardly sting anymore...
This cannot go on...
Please... I'm so exhausted...
I feel so...cold...
There's no redemption for me, is there?
I must confess, Fire is an awfully lonely friend...
Why? Whats the point? We are lost.
Leave me to my thoughts.
You must like wasting your time...
Don't bother.
Begone. Leave me to my fate...
Tastes like ashes...
I've lost my appetite.
Ah yes...I love the smell of burnt flesh in the morning.
They can't grab me if I'm already on fire!
The pull toward chaos is relentless, I embrace it.
The flames speak and they hunger!
Such warmth when embraced by FIRE!
Where there is smoke there is fire...
Watch them light up with just a spark!
Want to watch me juggle these explosives?
Let's see how flammable you really are!
Fire cleanses EVERYTHING it touches!
Like a moth to a flame!
Mistress Fire, embrace me!
I just mixed a new concoction! Time to test it out!
These monsters won't light themselves!
I'll catch them by surprise!
Time for a final blow!
Let me just mix a new concoction, give me a moment!
They'll never see it coming, heehee!
You may get caught in the cross-fire...
Don't worry, I've got everything under control! (laughs)
I'll get to it later.
I'm still mixing my concoctions!
Anyone have a light?
Has anyone seen my tinder box?
Well that doesn't make any sense.
We've got to keep them off their balance!
What do you think burns faster?
I put the "spontaneous" in "spontaneous combustion."
You're in for a big surprise!
I'm sure this is safe...
You think you can stop me?!
I AM FIREPROOF!
Close combat gets messy...
You stole my hammer didn't you!
You think I'm crazy?! You haven't seen crazy yet!
I am cleansed in the Everlasting Flame!
(laughs manically) The Fire is LIT! The path is clear! We have the strength to follow!
NO! I'M NOT FINISHED HERE!
I meant to do that!
Hmm, that usually doesn't happen.
You make a good point!
My turn next!
Stick 'em with the pointy end!
Got some smoke in your eye, eh?
Can't you see I'm holding explosives?!
Nothing gets past me!
I already have enough things to carry.
This thing is useless! Toss it into the flame!
Maybe you want a scar of your own? (pulls out poker)
What's wrong with another scar?
You will only make it worse!
Look how these flames in this campfire dance for me!
Oh look! I found an extra box of matches!
I can't recall the last time I saw the sun...
Not now! I'm mixing a *very* unstable concoction.
Did you know the strongest lye is made from burnt human fat?
I wouldn't come near, you're quite flammable.
As if you can offer me something fire cannot.
(nonsensical mumbling)
I like my meat burnt, black as ash...
You never forget the smell of burning flesh.
Like a Phoenix, I rise from the ashes!
I've walked through fire...literally.
I strike with Righteous Fire!
I will not succumb to this darkness!
I am the Everlasting Flame!
(chuckles) Barely a scratch.
I come prepared. Always.
WE ARE THE FLAME!
I'm prepared to go out in a Blaze of Glory!
I've been through Hell and back, this is nothing.
The Flame burns within me!
My fire rages on!
The enemy falters at our sight!
Worry not, I always have a plan!
WE ARE THE FLAME!
Stick to the plan, we'll see this through.
The flames consume the wicked!
My devotion will not be swayed!
I've got one last trick up my sleeve.
Strike hard, strike fast!
Focus on their weakpoints!
Heh, let's get dangerous!
Let us burn out this evil.
WE ARE THE FLAME!
I'm through playing around.
EVIL SHALL FEAR MY MIGHT!
Together we're as strong as a roaring fire!
They won't even know what hit 'em.
I've got fire in my veins.
I've been baptized by fire!
My path remains true!
Fast as a flash fire!
Haven't even broken a sweat.
You thought that would stop me?)
